description: The posture of the subject (for example, during a clinical measurement). This value set is not exhaustive.

references.description: The SNOMED code represents Position of body and posture (observable entity)
The SNOMED code represents Sitting position (finding)
The SNOMED code represents Lying (Recumbent) position (finding)
The SNOMED code represents Standing position (finding)
The SNOMED code represents Semi-recumbent position (finding)
